data.message: Hello My Facebook id hacked please help me

replies.message: Hi Hasseb. If your account was taken over by someone else, please report it to us: http://bit.ly/2AzCcNG. You can learn how to regain access to your account here: http://bit.ly/2AxlPBm. Additionally, we have several helpful tools you can use to better secure your account and recognize attempts to compromise your information. Lastly, you can learn to log out of all active sessions here: http://bit.ly/2zUtTg7. To learn more about these tools and how to keep your account safe, visit Privacy Basics at: http://bit.ly/2ivYkBF. -Tenaya
